func_sig.description: Calculate the sum of distinct remainders when squaring integers in a range.
func_sig.name: find_distinct_remainders_sum

modulus.description: The modulus to compute the remainders against.

func_sig.description: Calculate the modular inverse of a number modulo another number using the Extended Euclidean Algorithm.
func_sig.name: calculate_modular_inverse

a.description: The number to find the modular inverse for.

func_sig.description: Convert a given decimal number to a specified base.
func_sig.name: convert_decimal_to_base

func_sig.description: Convert a repeating decimal represented as a string to a fraction.
func_sig.name: convert_repeating_decimal

decimal.description: The repeating decimal as a string, e.g., '0.42'.

func_sig.description: Convert a repeating decimal to a simplified fraction and calculate a + b.
func_sig.name: process_repeating_decimal

repeating_decimal.description: The repeating decimal as a string, e.g., '0.42'.

func_sig.description: Convert a repeating decimal represented as a string to a fraction and return a + b.
func_sig.name: convert_repeating_decimal_to_fraction

repeating_decimal.description: The repeating decimal as a string, e.g., '0.42'.
